title: Ottar, Man of Laketown (1R80)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Ally • Home 3 • Man
Strength:	2
Vitality:	2
Site:	3
Game Text:	To play, spot Gandalf. Fellowship: Exert Ottar to discard up to 3 cards from hand and draw an equal number of cards.
Lore:	The Men of Laketown come from the North, where they trade with the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain.
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Lists: ERL, MXL
